main event: Two white objects with bright tails were seen flying side-by-side and moving slowly downward before suddenly disappearing in Cloverdale, Oregon.
interesting points: The objects had a bright tail pointing downward.
The objects made a slow downward movement before suddenly disappearing.
The duration of the sighting ruled out the possibility of it being a meteor.
The westerly component of the direction ruled out the objects being associated with weather phenomena.
The sighting was reported by A3C P.C. Collier, an NCO Observer.
sighted object: two white objects with bright tails
photographs: yes, but not included in the report
